ranked.description: Players receive points based on their final position in each game. In a game with 'n' players, 1st place receives 'n-1' points, 2nd place receives 'n-2' points, and so on, with last place receiving 0 points. For example, in a 4-player game: 1st place gets 3 points, 2nd gets 2, 3rd gets 1, and 4th gets 0.
